Task.Name: Load-TransformTable
Task.Sql:
;WITH i AS ( SELECT area ,code ,CASE WHEN Modifier LIKE 'GlobalComponent' THEN NULL WHEN Modifier LIKE 'ProfessionalComponent' THEN '26' WHEN Modifier LIKE 'TechincalComponent' THEN 'TC' WHEN Modifier LIKE 'FacilityComponent' THEN NULL END AS modifier ,CASE WHEN Modifier IN ( 'GlobalComponent' ,'ProfessionalComponent' ,'TechincalComponent' ) THEN 'Clinic' WHEN Modifier LIKE 'FacilityComponent' THEN 'Hospital' END AS PlaceOfService ,Amount ,StartDate ,EndDate FROM ImportBlueCrossSchedule i unpivot(Amount FOR Modifier IN ( GlobalComponent ,ProfessionalComponent ,TechincalComponent ,FacilityComponent )) unpiv )
INSERT INTO dbo.[TransformBlueCrossSchedule] ( [Area] ,[Code] ,[Amount] ,[PlaceOfService] ,[Modifier] ,[StartDate] ,[EndDate] )
SELECT i.[Area] ,i.[Code] ,i.[Amount] ,i.[PlaceOfService] ,i.[Modifier] ,i.StartDate ,i.EndDate FROM i LEFT JOIN dbo.[TransformBlueCrossSchedule] t ON i.Area = t.Area AND isnull(i.modifier, 1) = isnull(t.modifier, 1) AND i.PlaceOfService = t.PlaceOfService AND i.Amount = t.Amount AND i.StartDate = t.StartDate AND i.EndDate = t.EndDate WHERE t.RecordID IS NULL

Task.Name: Load-SourceScheduleData
Task.Sql:
---Delete replaced records from source schedule data DELETE FROM dbo.SourceScheduleData WHERE RecordID IN ( SELECT tt.RecordID FROM ( Select indx = row_number() OVER ( PARTITION BY code ,placeOfService ,area ,modifier ORDER BY StartDate DESC ) ,t.RecordID FROM dbo.TransformBlueCrossSchedule t ) tt LEFT JOIN dbo.SourceScheduleData s ON tt.RecordID = s.RecordID WHERE tt.indx > 1 )
------Insert new replacement records INSERT INTO dbo.sourcescheduledata ( code ,Modifier ,PlaceOfService ,Amount ,StartDate ,EndDate ,Area ,ScheduleName ,RecordID ) SELECT tt.code ,tt.modifier ,tt.PlaceOfService ,tt.Amount ,tt.StartDate ,tt.EndDate ,tt.Area ,tt.ScheduleName ,tt.RecordID FROM ( SELECT indx = row_number() OVER ( PARTITION BY code ,placeOfService ,area ,modifier ORDER BY StartDate DESC ) ,t.code ,t.modifier ,t.PlaceOfService ,t.Amount ,t.StartDate ,t.EndDate ,t.Area ,ScheduleName = 'BlueCross-Fixed-Clinic-Area' + t.area ,t.RecordID FROM dbo.TransformBlueCrossSchedule t ) tt left join dbo.SourceScheduleData s on tt.RecordID = s.RecordID WHERE tt.indx = 1 and s.RecordID is null
